0x00040000.description: Island control, including resets, clocks, and other miscellanea
0x00040000.name: IslandControl

0x00004040.description: Event plane routing configuration, for local ring and global chain as it passes through the island
0x00004040.name: EventRouteConfig

0x00005400.description: Clock and reset control for the island
0x00005400.name: ClockResetControl

0x00005404.description: Island-level memory control, for sleep etc
0x00005404.name: MemControl

0x00005408.description: Clock and reset control for the island (sub-domain control)
0x00005408.name: ClockResetControl2

0x00005600.description: Config register for the DSF Rate Meters for the Overlay Ports.
0x00005600.name: MeterCfg

0x00005604.description: Config register for the DSF Rate Meters for the Overlay Ports.
0x00005604.name: MeterCfg2

0x00005610.description: Overlay DSF Output Port 0 Rate Monitor for Mesh %d
0x00005610.name: OvlDsfOP0RateM%d

0x00005620.name: OvlDsfOP1RateM%d

0x00005630.name: OvlDsfOP2RateM%d

0x00005640.name: OvlDsfOP3RateM%d

0x00005650.name: OvlDsfOP4RateM%d

0x00005660.description: Overlay DSF Output Port 5 Rate Monitor for Mesh %d
0x00005660.name: OvlDsfOP5RateM%d

0x00005670.name: OvlDsfOP6RateM%d

0x00005680.description: Overlay DSF Output Port 7 Rate Monitor for Mesh %d
0x00005680.name: OvlDsfOP7RateM%d

0x00005690.description: Overlay DSF Input Port 6 Rate Monitor for Mesh %d
0x00005690.name: OvlDsfIP6RateM%d

0x000056a0.description: Overlay DSF Input Port 7 Rate Monitor for Mesh %d
0x000056a0.name: OvlDsfIP7RateM%d

fields.description: Set to enable the clock for a clock domain.  Each bit (0-7) applies to each reset/clock domain (0-7) for the current island.
fields.name: ClockEnable

fields.description: Set to deassert soft reset for a clock/reset domain (unless the global soft reset signal is asserted and not maksed).  Each bit (0-7) applies to each reset/clock domain (0-7) for the current island.
fields.name: RemoveReset

fields.description: When set, masks (ignores) the Global soft reset signal.  Each bit (0-7) applies to each reset/clock domain (0-7) for the current island.
fields.name: ResetMask

fields.description: When set, prevents modifying the corresponding bits in registers OvlClkRstControl and OvlMemControl for the current island.  For instance, when bit 0 of Lock is set, the settings in OvlClkRstControl and OvlMemControl corresponding to reset/clock domain 0 cannot be modified.
fields.name: DomainLock

fields.description: Set to 0 to disable the clock for a clock sub-domain, otherwise the clock is controlled by the encompassing clock/reset domain.  Each bit (0-7) applies to each reset/clock sub-domain (0-7) for the current island primary domain.
fields.name: ClockEnable

fields.description: Set to 0 to assert soft reset for a clock/reset sub-domain (unless the global soft reset signal is asserted and not maksed), otherwise the manual reset is controlled by the encompassing clock/reset domain.  Each bit (0-7) applies to each reset/clock sub-domain (0-7) for the current island primary domain.
fields.name: RemoveReset

fields.description: When set to 1, masks (ignores) the Global soft reset signal for this sub-domain, otherwise the reset mask is controlled by the encompassing clock/reset domain.  Each bit (0-7) applies to each reset/clock sub-domain (0-7) for the current island primary domain.
fields.name: ResetMask

fields.description: Set to 0 to force the memories in this sub-domain into shut down mode, otherwise memories are controlled by the encompassing clock/reset domain.  Each bit (0-7) applies to each reset/clock sub-domain (0-7) for the current island primary domain.
fields.name: MemEnable

fields.description: Clock Throttle Control - For a throttle value of N, suppress N T_CLK clock pulses out of every 64, effectively reducing the processing speed by N/64.  This will reduce dynamic power consumption incrementally.
fields.name: ClkThrtl

fields.description: This is the rate of transactions going to/from the overlay on the given Port and Mesh of the current Island.
fields.name: Rate

fields.description: Bypass Mux - for bypassing the interior of the island.
fields.name: BypassInterior

fields.description: Selects to which corner overlay port in the event bus plane to send events filtered from the local chain as 'global'
fields.name: GlobalInjection

fields.description: For the ARM island only, selects which overlay corner input port drives the global event bus into the ARM for use with the global event manger
fields.name: GlobalMux

fields.description: Selects which event plane input (from one of the 4 corners of the island or from the island interior) to use as the input to the interior output mux to drive the event bus plane interior output
fields.name: IntInput

fields.description: Selects which event plane input (from one of the 4 corners of the island or from the island interior) to use as the input to the bottom-right corner output mux to drive the event bus plane bottom-right corner output
fields.name: BRInput

fields.description: Selects which event plane input (from one of the 4 corners of the island or from the island interior) to use as the input to the bottom-left corner output mux to drive the event bus plane bottom-left corner output
fields.name: BLInput

fields.description: Selects which event plane input (from one of the 4 corners of the island or from the island interior) to use as the input to the top-right corner output mux to drive the event bus plane top-right corner output
fields.name: TRInput

fields.description: Selects which event plane input (from one of the 4 corners of the island or from the island interior) to use as the input to the top-left corner output mux to drive the event bus plane top-left corner output
fields.name: TLInput

fields.description: REMOVED NOW DO NOT USE If asserted, route the bottom-right island ports in/out of the center; if clear, engage loopbacks (external loop to external, internal to internal)
fields.name: RouteBR

fields.description: REMOVED NOW DO NOT USE If asserted, route the bottom-left island ports in/out of the center; if clear, engage loopbacks (external loop to external, internal to internal)
fields.name: RouteBL

fields.description: REMOVED NOW DO NOT USE If asserted, route the top-right island ports in/out of the center; if clear, engage loopbacks (external loop to external, internal to internal)
fields.name: RouteTR

fields.description: REMOVED NOW DO NOT USE If asserted, route the top-left island ports in/out of the center; if clear, engage loopbacks (external loop to external, internal to internal)
fields.name: RouteTL

fields.description: Mask for which of the event bits must be set; see also the Peripheral Event Manager FilterMask
fields.name: EventMask

fields.description: Values of the event bits, masked by FilterMask, which must be set for the event to be 'filtered' onto the global event chain; see also the Peripheral Event Manager EventFilterMatch
fields.name: EventMatch

fields.description: Set to enable memories in the reset/clock domains.  Each bit (0-7) applies to each reset/clock domain (0-7) for the current island.
fields.name: Enable

fields.description: Miscellaneous Control Register - function depends on island.
fields.name: MiscCtrl
